feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.9.9
entry.content: 🆕 Add Japanese translation of the signing form 🆕 Allow to sort templates by name, date or recent use 🆕 Add vertical align field settings

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.9.10
entry.content:
🆕 Drag&Drop files into dashboard and template editor 🆕 Drag&Drop templates into folders 🆕 Add template default expiration preferences

Pro

🆕 "Private" template access control

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.0
entry.content:
👉 This release marks 2 years of DocuSeal development 🎉 👉 This release doesn't contain any breaking changes but only small fixes and improvements

Pro

🛠 Add "Tenant Admin" user role

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.1
entry.content: 🆕 Add BMP image support 🛠 Use a new more performant PDF render engine

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 2.0.2
entry.content:
🛠 Make template shared signing links disabled by default

ℹ️ The app now uses a more secure default setting, with template form links disabled by default. ℹ️ Updating is recommended for all self-hosted installations.
